references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced the Stable Diffusion model, a foundational technology for high-quality image generation that is heavily used in Textoon.
This paper introduced the concept of large language models (LLMs) as few-shot learners, which is crucial for Textoon's accurate text parsing and generation capabilities.

references.paper_title: Exploring the limits of transfer learning with a unified text-to-text transformer
references.reason: This work introduced the T5 model, which is a foundational model for the transfer learning techniques used in Textoon's text parsing module.

references.paper_title: SAM 2: Segment anything in images and videos
references.reason: This paper presented the SAM2 method, which is used in Textoon for precise pixel-level segmentation in image editing.

references.paper_title: Adding conditional control to text-to-image diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced ControlNet which is used in Textoon for enhancing the control and flexibility of generative models during the image generation process.
